Detailed Description

This class maintains a set of 32 boolean capabilities.

const Capabilities &  off 
) const [inline]

This method checks whether the given capabilities are on/off.

Parameters:
on Capabilities that should be on.
off Capabilities that should be off.

bool Capabilities::matchAny ( const Capabilities &  on,
const Capabilities &  off 
) const [inline]

This method checks whether any of the given capabilities are on/off.

Parameters:
on Capabilities, one of which should be on.
off Capabilities, one of which should be off.
Returns:
True if the given capabilities match any of those set.
